title: Scarlett Johansson Joins Chris Hemsworth & Brian Tyree Henry at ‘Transformers One’ Premiere in London | Brian Tyree Henry, Chris Hemsworth, Keegan-Michael Key, Movies, Scarlett Johansson, Transformers, transformers one | Just Jared: Celebrity News and Gossip | Entertainment
text: Scarlett Johansson Joins Chris Hemsworth & Brian Tyree Henry at 'Transformers One' Premiere in London [Scarlett Johansson](https://www.justjared.com/tags/scarlett-johansson/) has arrived on the [Transformers One](https://www.justjared.com/tags/transformers-one/) press tour! On Thursday (September 19), the 39-year-old Black Widow actress joined fellow [Marvel Cinematic Universe](https://www.justjared.com/tags/marvel/) alums [Chris Hemsworth](https://www.justjared.com/tags/chris-hemsworth/) and [Brian Tyree Henry](https://www.justjared.com/tags/brian-tyree-henry/) on the red carpet at the European premiere of their new movie in London, England. She arrived at Cineworld Leicester Square looking resplendent in a long-sleeved maroon dress. This marks the first time that Scarlett has made it to a promotional event for the movie. The reason why was seemingly explained earlier this week. Keep reading to find out more… If you were unaware, Scarlett is currently filming her upcoming movie, Jurassic World Rebirth in London. As her costars were making stops across the globe, it seems that she’s been busy on set. The trio was joined by their costar [Keegan-Michael Key](https://www.justjared.com/tags/keegan-michael-key/) (with his wife Elle) and director Josh Cooley. We’ve got photos of everyone in the gallery. Transformers One arrives in theaters on September 20. [Check out the trailer](https://www.justjared.com/2024/07/25/chris-hemsworth-brian-tyree-henry-keegan-michael-key-bring-transformers-one-to-comic-con-debut-new-trailer-watch-now/)! Have you seen the [first photo of Scarlett in character](https://www.justjared.com/2024/08/29/jurassic-world-4-confirms-title-first-look-at-scarlett-johansson-jonathan-bailey-mahershala-ali-revealed/) for Jurassic World Rebirth? FYI: Scarlett is wearing Saint Laurent by Anthony Vaccarello. Scroll through all of the photos from the latest Transformers One premiere in the gallery… [Brian Tyree Henry](https://dev.justjared.com/tags/brian-tyree-henry/), [Chris Hemsworth](https://dev.justjared.com/tags/chris-hemsworth/), [Keegan-Michael Key](https://dev.justjared.com/tags/keegan-michael-key/), [Movies](https://dev.justjared.com/tags/movies/), [Scarlett Johansson](https://dev.justjared.com/tags/scarlett-johansson/), [Transformers](https://dev.justjared.com/tags/transformers/), [transformers one](https://dev.justjared.com/tags/transformers-one/)
